name: Flatmates
description:
You have 90 seconds to defeat your flatmate in a sneaky way, by using what you find around the apartment.
No melee, no fighting... Just EVIL TRAPS!

Play with your friend in a local multiplayer mode 1 vs 1

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
Player 1: WASD for movement. F for action.
Player 2: Arrow keys for movement. Spacebar for action.
You can also play with X-BOX controllers (but it crashes on Firefox).

INTERACTIONS
- Bring the garbage bag inside your flatmate's room to make him a timed damage!
- Throw bananas and oil on the flooor to make him slip!
- Turn on the tv to hypnotize him!
- Have a shower to heal yourself!
- Throw the hair dryer inside the shower to give him an electric shock!
- Use the sink from the other toilette to freeze the player on the shower!
- Turn on fire from the fireplace or from the stove to burn your opponent!

Authors
Stefano Fadda
Roberta Scano
Francesco Laddomada
Davide Melis

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2019 in Cagliari, Italy. We kept working on it during our free time to make it more polished and balanced.
